name: project_sqlserver
description: Project on building a website of a clinic using database ## Nodejs & MySQL install To run this project, you will need to have your machine installed Nodejs ( We recommend using 18.15.0 since we're using it on this project) and MySQL.

scripts.install: cd client && npm install && cd .. && cd server && npm install
scripts.database: cd server && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
